A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was nervous when Mark Hamill said that he \"fundamentally disagreed with every decision\" that Rian Johnson made concerning his character; now I understand why. Unfortunately\, the problems in this film don't end with Luke. It feels like Rian Johnson wanted to throw out everything JJ Abrams\, Lawrence Kasdan\, and Michael Arndt helped set up in TFA\, and claim that by doing so\, his writing decisions were \"bold\". I truly have little interest in seeing Episode 9.
